item.title:
Elon Musk’s Neuralink says that they received the FDA’s approval to launch their first-in-human clinical study.
The startup is building a brain implant called the Link, which aims to help patients with severe paralysis control external technologies using only neural signals.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: ‘Super Mario Advance,’ ‘Super Mario World: Super Mario Advance 2,’ and ‘Yoshi’s Island: Super Mario Advance 3’ are now available for #NintendoSwitchOnline + Expansion Pack members.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: A Pokémon HOME update that will add Pokémon Scarlet & Violet connectivity will be available on May 30.

item.title:
Dua Lipa has released the music video for her new song, “Dance The Night,” off the upcoming #Barbie soundtrack.
